data.description: Perl interface to the Portable Batch System
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It really doesn't fit squarely under a different namespace, but I'm
    open to putting it anyplace you feel appropriate. This module is
    simply an object oriented perl interface to the Portable Batch
    System (tested agains PBSPro and OpenPBS) API.
